chapters.title: Chapter 23: Call to a Sitting
chapters.info: Janya Frende, p. 491—Sitter for the Brown Ajah among the rebel Aes Sedai. She is extraordinarily neat, especially for a Brown—every one of her short, dark hairs is exactly in place at all times. She was one of only three sitters to stand for war with Tar Valon when the vote was first called for. She has unwavering support for Egwene.
